properties.areaDesc: Daviess, IN; Knox, IN; Gibson, IN; Pike, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 3 at 9:40PM EST until January 5 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...A Flood Warning continues for portions of the following waterways
in Indiana...

East Fork White River...White River...


.Additional precipitation across portions of central and southern
Indiana in the last 24 hours will prolong high water along portions
of the lower White River and East Fork White River by an additional
24 hours or so. Additional rainfall is expected late today
into Saturday, but should be light enough that impacts to river
levels will be minimal.

The Flood Warning continues for
The White River at Edwardsport.
* until late Saturday night.
* At  7:00 PM Friday the stage was 15.2 feet.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Forecast...It will continue to fall to below flood stage by
Saturday afternoon.
* At 15.0 feet...Flooding of low agricultural fields begin.  Daviess
CR 375 WN and North River Rd in Knox County located inside the
levees are flooded.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
